content.body:
This article covers how to add multiple users to your account at once by uploading a spreadsheet. If you prefer to add users one at a time, see [Add a new user](https://help.yext.com/hc/en\-us/articles/360000000966).





1. Click on the Account Details icon in the navigation bar and click **Account Settings**.
2. Click **Users**.
3. Click **+ Add** **User** and select **Bulk Upload Users**.
4. Click on the **Click here** link to download the template.



   * Note: If you are assigning a permission to a specific folder or set of folders, you can also click on the **click here** link in the **Access Controls: Scope ID** row to download a list of IDs for folders in your account.




5. Once the template is downloaded, fill in the relevant information based on the instructions on the page.



   * To assign multiple access controls to one user, once you add all of the required information to the row for that user, add the **Access Controls: Role ID, Access Controls: Scope Type**, and **Access Controls: Scope ID** for each additional access control to the consecutive rows, leaving all other fields in the row blank.




6. Click on the **Choose File** button at the bottom of the page to upload your spreadsheet.
7. Click **Process Upload**.




   * Once you successfully upload your spreadsheet, you will be directed to a confirmation page that will summarize the actions you've taken.





Once users are added to the account, they will need to verify their email address. To do this, see [Verify the email address associated with your Yext account](https://help.yext.com/hc/en\-us/articles/360034394132).  
You are responsible for ensuring that the correct personnel at your organization have appropriate access to data within the Yext platform. They should only be able to view and edit the data necessary to meet the requirements of their specific roles at your company.  
We encourage you to take a conservative, least\-privilege approach to assigning user permissions. We also encourage you to periodically review the list of users in your account and the permissions you've assigned to each.  
For assistance or more information, contact Yext Support or your Client Success Manager.

helpstarter_helpArticleBodyMarkdown.markdown:
This article covers how to add multiple users to your account at once by uploading a spreadsheet. If you prefer to add users one at a time, see Add a new user.

  1. Click on the Account Details icon in the navigation bar and click Account Settings.
  2. Click Users.
  3. Click + Add User and select Bulk Upload Users.
  4. Click on the Click here link to download the template.
    • Note: If you are assigning a permission to a specific folder or set of folders, you can also click on the click here link in the Access Controls: Scope ID row to download a list of IDs for folders in your account.
  5. Once the template is downloaded, fill in the relevant information based on the instructions on the page.
    • To assign multiple access controls to one user, once you add all of the required information to the row for that user, add the Access Controls: Role ID, Access Controls: Scope Type, and Access Controls: Scope ID for each additional access control to the consecutive rows, leaving all other fields in the row blank.
  6. Click on the Choose File button at the bottom of the page to upload your spreadsheet.
  7. Click Process Upload.
    • Once you successfully upload your spreadsheet, you will be directed to a confirmation page that will summarize the actions you’ve taken.

Once users are added to the account, they will need to verify their email address. To do this, see Verify the email address associated with your Yext account.

You are responsible for ensuring that the correct personnel at your organization have appropriate access to data within the Yext platform. They should only be able to view and edit the data necessary to meet the requirements of their specific roles at your company.
 
We encourage you to take a conservative, least-privilege approach to assigning user permissions. We also encourage you to periodically review the list of users in your account and the permissions you've assigned to each.
 
For assistance or more information, contact Yext Support or your Client Success Manager.

content.name: Add Users in Bulk
